nodes.text: The Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery-Anti-vehicle laser (SPHA-V) was a version of the Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery used by the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. It was equipped with an anti-vehicle laser as the main weapon, with 12 anti-personnel blasters to augment the cannon. While powerful, the SPHA-V also had to manage ammunition carefully like all of its other cousins.
